alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Jo Daviess; Mercer; Rock Island; Stephenson; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 22 at 7:41AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A snow squall will affect Southeastern Rock island...Northwestern Mercer...Northwestern Whiteside...Jo daviess...Central Carroll... Western Stephenson...Northwestern Louisa...Jackson...Eastern Cedar... Scott...Muscatine and Clinton counties through 830 AM CST... At 740 AM CST, a snow squall was located along a line extending from Apple River to Fruitland. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Visibilities less than a quarter of a mile and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar and observations. Locations impacted include... Davenport, Moline, Rock Island, Bettendorf, Clinton, Muscatine, Maquoketa, Galena, Columbus Junction, Durant, Mount Carroll, Eldridge, DeWitt, Milan, Camanche, West Liberty, Savanna, Lena, Wilton and Bellevue. This includes the following highways... Interstate 74 in Iowa between mile markers 1 and 5. Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 263 and 304. Interstate 74 in Illinois between mile markers 1 and 2. Interstate 280 between mile markers 1 and 16. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A rapid drop in temperatures will lead to the rapid formation of black ice on area roadways. Black ice is nearly impossible to see and roadways may appear wet. Please use extreme caution, especially on bridges, overpasses and around curves. Allow plenty of stopping distance and avoid braking suddenly.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Jo Daviess; Mercer; Rock Island; Stephenson; Whiteside
